data.actual_result: Discord changes the tabs to spaces, and the code pastes into an external app with spaces rather than tabs
data.expected_result: Discord should recognize the tabs as separators and maintain them in copied text
data.short_description: Code blocks change tabs to spaces upon copying out of Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a code block using the tab key as a separator between two pieces of text (copy this in from an external source, IE a programming tool) - Post it - Attempt to copy and paste it from Discord into another app (IE said programming tool)
